name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 16GB
description: Mainstream Ada GPU with 16GB GDDR6 for future-proofing. Great 1080p and solid 1440p gaming with full DLSS 3 support and efficient power consumption.

reviews.review_text: 16GB version is the one to get. No VRAM worries.
Good card but wish it was faster.
